ygData.subject: Root and Shoot
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I have heard about this Root and Shoot strategy and I am greatly curious about what it is.  I have all the RANK 2 spells except Glimpse and I need
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,

I have heard about this "Root and Shoot" strategy and I am greatly curious
about what it is. I have all the RANK 2 spells except Glimpse and I need a
good way to kill things as I am getting nowhere towards my next level (Level
7). I currently reside in Qeynos (Human), and I am looking for some way to
get to Level 7 without getting slain by Holly Crosstree or whatever her name
is.

I am also looking to learn some new languages but it's hard to do as I have
none to trade in return.

So, for those of you are confused, what is thr "Root and Shoot" strategy?

(The strategy I use sometimes is to cast Root then Icestrike, back away, and
watch the enemy get pelted, then finish them with my staff when Icestrike or
Root ends.)

Raestlin (Raistlin was taken, OK?)
Level 6 Human Wizard
Tunare Server (*SNIFF* I miss Veeshan!)
